name: Gelli Tower
description:
You, Gentlon the gentlegelli, are on a quest to save your friends Gelles, Lolo, Autumn, and Bonni from the deadly Gespinte, a gellipomorphic spider, from the terrifying Gelli Tower. Inside the tower is an infestation of mummified Gellis, the Gellibinde, protecting Gespinte from anyone who would dare interrupt his dinner jams.

Arrow keys: Move
'A' key: Attack
'Enter' key: Menu

If you play this game, leave an honest review. I will try to add some more functionality and variability to it post-jam. I also apologize profusely for the ever-repeating music track. Music isn't in my skillset, currently.

Credits:
Sounds were made by Kenney (www.kenney.nl) and rubberduck (https://opengameart.org/users/rubberduck)
Programming, music, and art by techramancer (https://www.techramancer.com/)
